committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights
Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary, and Vocational Education

official_title: Declaring the sense of the Congress regarding periods of silence in the public schools.

summary.text: Declares the sense of the Congress that the Constitution of the United States does not preclude the use of, and that public school authorities should recognize the value of, discretionary periods of silence for silent prayer, meditation, contemplation, or introspection in the public schools.

titles.title: Declaring the sense of the Congress regarding periods of silence in the public schools.
